docs.snippet: Nissan acted after getting reassurances that the company would be protected from any negative economic impact from Britain’s decision to leave the European Union....
docs.lead_paragraph: Nissan acted after getting reassurances that the company would be protected from any negative economic impact from Britain’s decision to leave the European Union.
docs.abstract: Nissan announces plans to build new car model at its existing plant in Sunderland, England, where some 500,000 cars are built annually for regional market; company based decision on assurances from British Prime Min Theresa May that it will be protected from negative economic fallout as result of Britain's decision to withdraw from European Union.

headline.main: Despite Brexit, Nissan Will Build New Car Model in Britain
headline.print_headline: Despite ‘Brexit,’ Nissan Commits to Building a New Car Model in Britain

docs.snippet: A British hedge fund group on Monday laid out its wishlist for Brexit negotiations, with continued access to European Union investors and workers among its goals to limit the damage a UK exit from the bloc could have on the industry....

docs.snippet: Mr. Farage was the first foreign politician to meet with President-elect Donald J. Trump, and on Monday, a photograph of the two inside Trump Tower dominated front pages in Britain....

docs.abstract: British Prime Minister Theresa May discourages growing relationship between Nigel Farage, populist-leader of UK Independence Party, and Pres-elect Donald J Trump, after Farage, in unannounced visit to Manhattan, becomes first foreign politician to visit Trump.

headline.main: U.K.’s Bridge to Trump? Nigel Farage, Who Pushed ‘Brexit,’ Posits Himself
headline.print_headline: ‘Brexit’ Leader Offers Himself as U.K.’s Bridge to Trump

docs.snippet: Fewer lots were offered in this week’s contemporary-art sales, but there were some significant high points....

docs.abstract: British art market remains relatively strong after country's vote to leave European Union; overall slowdown in sales seen as reflection of increased caution given uncertainty in global events.

headline.main: London Auctions Feel Little ‘Brexit’ Chill as Some Works Prove Hot
headline.print_headline: Little ‘Brexit’ Chill at Sales, as Some Works Prove Hot
